item.title: How I overcame depression
item.description: How I Overcame Depression Experience of Self-Healing Psychologist’s Diary Since my time in the army, I developed the habit of not treating the flu. Why from the army? Because in the army, they didn’t treat us for the flu. If it was a serious illness, we went to the infirmary (quarantine) or the hospital (treatment). I want to specifically point out that no treatment was provided in the infirmary because there were no medications.
